tweets.content: Miche, After 30 years, I’m not sure why you look exactly the same and I don’t. I do know that I won the lottery that day—that I couldn’t have asked for a better life partner. Happy anniversary, sweetheart!

combined_text:
Tweet 1 (❤️489 🔄40 💬22):
Happy birthday to my friend 
@KamalaHarris
! She has spent her life fighting on behalf of people who need a voice and a chance—now it’s our turn to help elect her as our next president. Make sure you're ready to vote at http://IWillVote.com.

Tweet 2 (❤️477 🔄32 💬13):
Miche, After 30 years, I’m not sure why you look exactly the same and I don’t. I do know that I won the lottery that day—that I couldn’t have asked for a better life partner. Happy anniversary, sweetheart!
summary: Birthday wishes from friends, congratulating them on their birthdays, also wishing them well in politics.
